name: The Duck (16BitBoo)
description:
This is my first ever commercial game project. A game based on a youtube video by the amazing Timotainment. This game has you navigate The Duck through 5 levels while trying to avoid hazards. 

For those playing on mobile devices, the web build is for the PC version. In the tutorial Z = A Button and X = B Button.

Created using GB Studio 2.0 created by Chris Maltby.

If you enjoyed the game, please consider donating. If you didn't, thank you for trying it out anyway.
